ObjectStates.Description: Cards that introduce new effects into the game.
ObjectStates.Name: DeckCustom

ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is one more than your personnel.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Add an additional market slot.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Select a culture card, any player may choose to use that culture's effect for the rest of the game.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Rewards from the market cost one more credit.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard a luck card in lieu of a credit. Do this only during your turn when one would buy from the market.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Discard down to your personel size as you take damage.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Each player discards a card when any player loses personnel.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Your max hand size is 6 minus your personnel.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Losing personnel instead causes you to gain personnel. If anyone goes above their max personnel, everyone loses.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you would lose personnel, your neighbour to the left loses it instead.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Reaching zero personnel is not a loss condition. You may play with a hand of zero cards.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The first time you take damage in a turn, take one more damage.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard your hand to avoid losing a personnel.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you would lose personnel, the player with the highest personnel loses it instead. If tied, you choose.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you would lose personnel, your neighbour to the right loses it instead.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Everyone takes 1 damage.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Remove one market slot.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Remove two market slots.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Remove the first reward slot.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Max hand size is decreased by one.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When this macguffin is unlocked, each player rolls their personnel die. This is their new personnel.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: No effect.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this macguffin discards their culture card, draws 3 culture cards and chooses one to keep
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Add one element card covering each remaining macguffin
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, shuffle the discarded element cards back into the deck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, shuffle the discarded reward cards back into the deck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Give your culture card to the player to your left.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Give your culture card to the player to your right.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You lose the game unless this mcguffin is unlocked last.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You lose the game unless this mcguffin is revealed first.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you may replace one macguffin with one drawn randomly from the red deck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you may replace one macguffin with one drawn randomly from the green deck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you must replace it with one drawn randomly from the red deck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you must replace it with one drawn randomly from the green deck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Replace each slot in the matrix with a card drawn from the element deck (burying luck cards as usual).
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Rearrange the matrix so that all elements are adjacent to their own type
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, remove one card from one locked macguffin.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, draw one reward card from the top of the reward deck to your hand. .
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: All players lay their hands face up in a pool, and redraw to max hand size. For the rest of the game, active players may buy from this pool at the cost of 2 element cards.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this now uses the element deck as their hand. Players draw from their hand randomly.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: A six card hand is dealt face up. Each turn it contributes its two rightmost cards to the pool. This hand is refilled at the start of every round.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this McGuffin, draw one reward card to be used towards unlocking or your hand.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Reaching zero personnel resets your personnel to max rather than ending the game. Discard your hand.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this MacGuffin gets 1 credit for each other unlocked MacGuffin to spend immediately.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Everyone gains one morale, up to their maximum.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When this macguffin is unlocked, player turn order is reversed. The round ends when the first player of the round finishes their next turn.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is equal to the player's with the largest max hand size.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is equal to the player's with the smallest max hand size.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: If you unlock this macguffin and another one in the same turn, you win the game.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The next macguffin you unlock after this one has no effect.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Every player loses one personnel when the market is refreshed.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you apply a reward to a macguffin, you may instead choose to apply the card from the top of the reward deck (make the decision before looking).
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Solving an obstacle with ____ causes you to discard a card. x6
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Do not reveal the second obstacle's reward when you finish the first obstacle.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Do not reveal the third obstacle's reward when you finish the second obstacle.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Do not reveal the fourth obstacle's reward when you finish the third obstacle.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: No credits are gained from defeating obstacles.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The second reward includes a credit. The third reward does not.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Accomplishing the fourth obstacle earns an extra credit.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: No luck can be played.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Reward cards with three elements can only be used for two of their elements at a time.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Reward cards with two elements can only be used for one of their elements at a time.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Reverse luck symbols require ____. x6
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: A single luck element card can be used to surpass an obstacle.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you play an ____ element card from your hand (not from the pool), draw a card. x6
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: On obstacle cards, treat ____ as reverse luck and reverse luck as ____. x6
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Anyone who doesn't contribute to the pool (including the current player) must discard a card.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: One random card is discarded from the pool each turn.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: After each pooling phase, draw one element card to add to the pool.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Only one player can contribute to the pool (before seeing the obstacles).
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The fourth obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The third obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The second obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The first obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot contribute 3 cards to the pool.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot contribute 2 cards to the pool.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot contribute 1 card to the pool unless you only have one card.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Take one damage when you encounter an obstacle with repeated symbols.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Reverse luck symbols require luck.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: At the start of each pooling phase, while the active player is blind, draw one card from the elements deck. If it matches an obstacle, discard it, otherwise add it to the pool. The blinded player should have no way of knowing if this card is in the pool.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: All players now join the pooling phase (unblinded) and cannot play cards from their hand to overcome obstacles.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Before each pooling phase, draw one element card to add to the pool.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Before the pooling phase, the active player discards their hand and the non-active players draw to their max hand size.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The active player reveals one card from their hand during pooling phase.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The market doesn't refresh at the end of the round.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Players must discard their hands at the end of each round before redrawing.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this macguffin must go first for the rest of the game.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When an action reward is played, other players may discard an element of the same type to also receive the effect.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot use reward cards with special abilities on your turn.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot use the special abilities of reward cards.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Refresh the market at the end of every turn
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: When you unluck this macguffin, your turn is skipped until another macguffin is unlocked on a subsequent turn.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Add a reward to the first obstacle.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Roll the D-element at the beginning of each turn, that element can be used as luck for the remainder. x6
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The first reward is always face up.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The second reward is always face up.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: The third reward is always face up.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Add a fifth obstacle and fourth reward (no extra credits).
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Cultural powers cannot be used.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card

ContainedObjects.Description: Any player who has left Earth's atmosphere may pick up 3 element cards when this MacGuffin is unlocked.
ContainedObjects.Name: Card
